alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Livingston; Monroe; Ontario; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 1:44AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Wyoming, Livingston, southeastern Genesee, southwestern Monroe and Ontario Counties through 230 AM EDT... At 142 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking several strong thunderstorms over the western Finger Lakes region that are moving east at 40 to 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and rainfall of one to two inches. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Batavia, Canandaigua, Geneseo, Letchworth State Park, Le Roy, Perry, Warsaw, Avon, Mount Morris, Victor, Honeoye Falls, Pavilion, Conesus, Bristol, Caledonia, Lima, Clifton Springs, Phelps, Bloomfield and Naples. This includes the following highways... Interstate 390 between exits 6 and 11. Interstate 90 between exits 44 and 43. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM EDT for western New York.
